mapper.select: SELECT match_notice_no AS matchNoticeNo, sport_entries_no AS sportEntriesNo, team_no AS teamNo, reservation_no AS reservationNo FROM t_reservation WHERE reservation_no = #{reservationNo}

SELECT j.match_join_member_no AS matchJoinMemberNo, j.match_notice_no AS matchNoticeNo, j.member_no AS memberNo, j.team_no AS teamNo, j.home_away AS homeAway, m.member_name AS memberName FROM t_match_join_member j INNER JOIN t_member m ON j.member_no = m.member_no WHERE match_notice_no = #{matchNoticeNo} AND (home_away = 'home' or home_away = 'away')
